title: spec ops rengar
body:
spec ops rengar 
a bowie knife or kukri, regular bladed gauntlet (unless you guys have something cooler in mind)
he could wear a ghillie suit and have three eyed night vision goggles

quotes: (his voice comes across as a radio transmission)
movement:
"target in range"
"moving to destination"

entering stealth:
"ah. the element of surprise"
taunts:
"i dont need three eyes to see you dead."

quotes for trophies:
3:"training completed."
6:"sector clear!"
12: "they stand no chance."
20: "operation completed."
head of kha zix: "i have the objective."

animations:
recalling: rengar fires a flare off into the sky and shortly after a helicopter noise fades in before a rope is lowered. rengar grabs the rope and flies away as the helicopter noise fades out
upon having recalled:
rengar slides down the helicopters rope and lands on the spawn pool

ultimate activated:
rengars night vision goggles glow and instead of red lighting everything is shown in a faint green light. champions are marked with the sights of a sniper rifle.

passive active: rengars night vision goggles glow again.

bola: throws a flashbang. it sparks if they are stunned by it. (could alternatively throw a knife)
Q: knife glows a bright green

replies.body:
OMG BECOME RITO SKIN DESIGNER YOU AMAZE ME.
im not even joking dude i love this idea
I'm pretty sure I've seen some one post this before

who was the one that thought this was awful? 
man they have bad tastes

Omg, this is soo good, this is perfect.
How come I never came up with this!?

There should more quotes for movement and attacking. 
Attacking:
"Target in range."

Also his Empowered Bola snares, it does not stun, a snared opponent can still attack.
This is awesome man honestly, rengar needs a good skin
